name: polar-hooks
description: Performs HTTP auth for us using a token scheme
author: burton@getpolarized.io

scripts.dist-release-polar-cors: firebase use polar-cors && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.dist-release-polar-cors-beta: firebase use polar-cors-beta && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.dist-release-main-webapp: firebase use polar-32b0f && firebase target:clear hosting app.getpolarized.io && firebase target:apply hosting app.getpolarized.io polar-webapp && firebase deploy
scripts.dist-release: npm run-script dist-release-main-webapp && npm run-script dist-release-polar-cors
